page.title: 06The Shopping Centre cont.
page.content: {Shopping Counts:}We recorded numbers of people going through entrances of two supermarkets, during l5 minutes, on a weekday. Shop A: 6O women, 2O men, 7 children. Shop B: 2O women, 9 men, 3 children. We thought we would find a lot more women than men doing shopping on a weekday, but we were surprised that there were not more children with them. {Carpark Counts:}There is plenty of space for parking and it is free. The market square is used and there are 2 parks in Millgate.{Market Square:}2lO cars, 3 lorries, 3 buses, l bicycle {Millgate:}66 cars, 2 lorries Our results show that people like to park as near to the centre as possible {Use of buildings:}Most buildings in the centre are to do with trade. Although we did not manage to count
